subject: Attention.
body:
I've invited you to fill out the following form:
Attention.

To fill it out, visit:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdr5NNon3MwrTKj_ecfhrl6De3bFKRkkjHj6MNzuX4hF1cSLw/viewform?vc=0&c=0&w=1&flr=0&usp=mail_form_link

Am here to inform you concerning your funds with the IRS, recovered from  
Africa in stipulated in your name which is under the IRS management, listen  
to this message very well and carry out the introductions cause

This is to enlighten you of a very important information which will be of a  
great help to redeem you from all the difficulties you have been  
experiencing in getting your long overdue payment due to excessive demand  
of money from you by both corrupt Bank officials and Courier Companies,  
Diplomatic agents and fraudulent barristers after which your fund/payment  
remain unpaid to you.

I am Mrs. Olivia Robert, a highly placed official of the Inland Revenue  
Service (IRS) Washington, D.C. where I have been assigned to take  
responsibility for your funds remittance to you without further delay. It  
may interest you to know that reports have reached our office by so many  
correspondence on the uneasy way which people like you are treated by  
Various Banks and Courier Companies across Europe to Africa and Asia and we  
have decided to put a stop to these nightmares, which is the reason I was  
appointed to handle your transaction. Be informed that you were listed  
among a few beneficiaries to receive the sum of $15.8 million United States  
Dollars.

All Governmental and Non-Governmental parasites, NGOs, Finance Companies,  
Banks, Security Companies and Courier companies which have been in contact  
with you of late have been instructed to quit and back up from your  
transaction and YOU have been advised NOT to respond to them anymore since  
the Inland Revenue Service is now directly in charge of your payment. You  
are hereby advised NOT to remit further payment to any institutions with  
respect to your transaction/funds remittance as your fund will be  
transferred to you directly from our source. I hope this is clear. Any  
action contrary to this instruction is at your own risk.

Respond to this e-mail with immediate effect and we shall give you further  
details on how your funds will be released to you. Contact me here.

Note you have to pay for the release order of the fund. You have to choose  
the options of bank to bank transfer and consignment box delivery.

NB: Please kindly report any suspected scam/fraud email or ongoing  
transaction to this office immediately for investigation and verification  
and wait for feedback. God bless you. Kindly forward your contact info as I  
await your response. Below is the contact info needed.

1. Full Name
2. Residential Address
3. Age
4. Occupation
5. Direct Telephone Numbers
6. A Copy of Your Identification

With all due respect sir, to make your repayment by international revenue  
service.  (IRS )

(1) you will have to tell us exactly the amount which you are expected to  
receive

(2) you have to forward any documents related to your dealings with your  
former associate to enable us identify the genuinely of your transaction

(3) your bank account you are to receive your funds on

(4) reconfirm your identity like driver's license or international  
passport.

After then I shall proceed on processing your funds to be transferred to  
you without any delay. I will also check if your associate has been paying  
the necessary fees to the right channel.

I understand your situation. Please confirm to me your readiness to  
conclude this transaction. With reference to our conversation, i want to  
sound it emphatically that you must go along with me in  this transaction,  
you must be ready to toe my directives and instructions to the letter  
because a new directive to actualize the consignment have been formalized  
now with the bank to bank transfer via MT 103/202 i have shocking  
revelations, which bounces back to the fact that you have too many  
associates you have been dealing with and most of them have limited access  
to concluding your records, that could bring reasonable benefits, The  
documents of the above names are the requirements by the banking authority,  
Note that all the above documents will be issued in your own name as the  
beneficiary.

1. Approval Foreign Trade Income, Tax Certificate,
2. Antiterrorist Clearance Certificate,
3. Approval Slip, Certificate
4. IMF International Monetary Fund Liquidation Washing
5. Money Laundry Clearance Certificate (MLCC).
6. Drug free Certificate,
7. Tax Clearance Certificate,
8. FBIR certificate
9. Tax/Stamp Duty,
10. Insurance,

I WOULD LIKE TO READ IN YOUR NEXT EMAIL THAT ACTIONS TAKEN AS PER MY  
DIRECTIONS AND ADVICE TO ACHIEVE MEANING OBJECTIVES.

I WISH YOU SAFE
REGARDS,

Mrs. Olivia Robert

Google Forms: Create and analyze surveys.

subject: Re: Attention.
body:
Hello Mrs. Olivia Robert,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information about the funds with the IRS. It's quite a surprise to hear that there are funds stipulated in my name, especially from Africa! 

I'm curious, how did these funds end up under my name? And why were they recovered from Africa? I don't recall having any financial dealings in Africa.

You mentioned that I am among a few listed to receive a sum of million United States Dollars. That sounds like an enormous amount! How was this list created and why was I included?

Also, you mentioned that I have to pay for the release order of the fund and choose between bank to bank transfer and box delivery. Could you please explain more about these options? What would be the process for each option?

Lastly, you asked for some personal details including Full Name, Address, Age, Occupation, Direct Telephone Numbers and Copy of my ID. While I understand your need for this information, due to privacy concerns I prefer not to share such sensitive information over email.

Looking forward to hearing more about this intriguing situation!

Best wishes,
Leah
